dialogs module¶

Additional dialogs used by the application

dialogs.about(parent, version)[source]¶

About dialog

dialogs.critical(parent, message)[source]¶

A simple error message, Returns True on OK.

dialogs.dialog(message, title='Warning', more='', details='', choice=False)[source]¶

A simple message box. Returns True if Ok / Yes, otherwise False.

dialogs.modeless_dialog(parent, message, title='Warning', more='', details='')[source]¶

A simple non-modal message box

dialogs.save_results(parent, text)[source]¶

Save results to file dialog

dialogs.warning(parent, message)[source]¶

A simple warning message, Returns True on OK.
